3.「……今 人と話す気分じゃないんだ。| 悪いけど ひとりにしてくれるかな。: ... I don't feel like talking right now. I'm|sorry, leave me alone.

|time.

Even if this horrific disease can be cured,|there is no guarantee that my son's fingers|will ever work again. He will need long and|

47.「……これも キミたちの 手作りなのかい？: ... Is this one of your handiwork?

52.「ありがとう みんな。| こんな 晴れ晴れとした気持ちで| トゥーラを弾くのは: Thank you . It's been a long time since I've|played the tula with such a clear mind.

53.「僕は つい最近まで 手足の先から| だんだん石化してしまうという| おぞましい: Until recently, I was afflicted with a|horrifying disease that gradually petrifies|me from the tips of my hands and feet.

59.「でも そんなこと どうでもいいよ。| 病気で苦しんで 指先も動かせない人生より: But I don't care about that. I'd rather be|here playing as many songs as I want than be|sick and not be able to move my fingers.
